mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product(name, price, stock, description, image_url, create_time, status) VALUES (#{name}, #{price}, #{stock}, #{description}, #{imageUrl}, NOW(), 1)
mapper.select: SELECT id, name, price, stock, description, image_url AS imageUrl, create_time AS createTime, status FROM product ORDER BY create_time DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE product SET status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
